title: Will Continue To Fight For "Sacred Mission": Netanyahu On 1st Year Of War
content: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu, at an official memorial marking the anniversary of October 7 attack Monday, vowed to press on fighting until achieving the "sacred mission" of the war against Hamas.
summary: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu, at an official memorial marking the anniversary of October 7 attack Monday, vowed to press on fighting until achieving the "sacred mission" of the war against Hamas.

title: Israel Army Issues New Call For South Beirut Residents To Evacuate
content: The Israeli army on Monday issued their latest call for residents to evacuate from areas in southern Beirut, following a string of similar messages as the military bombs Hezbollah positions in Lebanon's capital.
summary: The Israeli army on Monday issued their latest call for residents to evacuate from areas in southern Beirut, following a string of similar messages as the military bombs Hezbollah positions in Lebanon's capital.

title: RuPay Launch In Maldives, New Airport At Runway To Boost Ties With India
content: The inauguration of a new runaway in the Maldives built under an airport redevelopment project assisted by India and the official launch of the RuPay card in the island nation on Monday are aimed at boosting relations.
summary: The inauguration of a new runaway in the Maldives built under an airport redevelopment project assisted by India and the official launch of the RuPay card in the island nation on Monday are aimed at boosting relations.

title: Jailed Imran Khan Banned From Meeting Wife, Lawyers Over "Security Concerns"
content: Pakistan's Punjab government on Monday banned jailed former premier Imran Khan from meeting his family members, lawyers and party leaders till October 18 due to "security concerns".
summary: Pakistan's Punjab government on Monday banned jailed former premier Imran Khan from meeting his family members, lawyers and party leaders till October 18 due to "security concerns".

title: Mexican Mayor Decapitated 6 Days After Taking Office, Head Found On Truck
content: The mayor of the capital of Mexico's violence-plagued state of Guerrero was killed on Sunday less than a week after he took office, the state's governor confirmed.
summary: The mayor of the capital of Mexico's violence-plagued state of Guerrero was killed on Sunday less than a week after he took office, the state's governor confirmed.

title: Illegal Immigrants Are Bringing "Bad Genes" Into US: Donald Trump
content: Donald Trump said Monday that illegal immigrants were bringing "bad genes" into the United States, doubling down on previous inflammatory rhetoric about migrants poisoning the blood of the country.
summary: Donald Trump said Monday that illegal immigrants were bringing "bad genes" into the United States, doubling down on previous inflammatory rhetoric about migrants poisoning the blood of the country.

title: "There's No Safe Place": 'Exhausted' Gazans After 1 Year Of War
content: One year after Hamas's deadly attack on Israel unleashed war in Gaza, the Palestinian territory is unrecognisable and its residents are exhausted by displacement and shortages, with no end in sight.
summary: One year after Hamas's deadly attack on Israel unleashed war in Gaza, the Palestinian territory is unrecognisable and its residents are exhausted by displacement and shortages, with no end in sight.

title: Ship With Russian Explosive Cargo Barred From Ports: "Floating Megabomb"
content: Ports throughout Europe have not allowed the ship to dock because it is carrying a staggering 20,000 tonnes of ammonium nitrate.
summary: Ports throughout Europe have not allowed the ship to dock because it is carrying a staggering 20,000 tonnes of ammonium nitrate.

title: Video: People Run For Cover After Air Raid Sirens Go Off In Israel
content: Air raid sirens echoed across central Israel including Tel Aviv after surface-to-surface missiles were fired from Yemen on Israel on the first anniversary of deadly attacks in Israel where over 1,200 people were killed.
summary: Air raid sirens echoed across central Israel including Tel Aviv after surface-to-surface missiles were fired from Yemen on Israel on the first anniversary of deadly attacks in Israel where over 1,200 people were killed.

title: Hit Over 120 Hezbollah Targets "Within An Hour": Israel Army
content: The Israeli military said it struck more than 120 Hezbollah targets in southern Lebanon within a 60-minute period as part of extensive strikes on Monday.
summary: The Israeli military said it struck more than 120 Hezbollah targets in southern Lebanon within a 60-minute period as part of extensive strikes on Monday.

title: Man Arrested In Moscow For Satanism, Promoting Same-Sex Relationships
content: Russia on Monday arrested a medic for "Satanism" and "promoting same-sex relationships", as Moscow intensifies a legal crackdown on LGBTQ rights, in defence of what it calls "traditional family values".
summary: Russia on Monday arrested a medic for "Satanism" and "promoting same-sex relationships", as Moscow intensifies a legal crackdown on LGBTQ rights, in defence of what it calls "traditional family values".

title: "Yaarana Chalta Rahega": Foreign Ministry On India-Maldives Relations
content: Maldives President Mohamed Muizzu is in India for a state visit, a significant moment in relations after the diplomatic relations between the states were severely affected when three Maldivian ministers made derogatory remarks against PM Modi.
summary: Maldives President Mohamed Muizzu is in India for a state visit, a significant moment in relations after the diplomatic relations between the states were severely affected when three Maldivian ministers made derogatory remarks against PM Modi.

title: PM Modi's State Visit To Maldives Next Year
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi has accepted Maldives President Mohamed Muizzu's invitation to travel to Male on a state visit next year, Foreign Secretary Vikram Misri announced on Monday.
summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modi has accepted Maldives President Mohamed Muizzu's invitation to travel to Male on a state visit next year, Foreign Secretary Vikram Misri announced on Monday.

title: Explained: What Is microRNA, The 2024 Noble-Winning Discovery
content: The Nobel Prize in Medicine was awarded on Monday to two US scientists for discovering microRNA, a previously unknown type of genetic switch which is hoped can pave the way for new medical breakthroughs.
summary: The Nobel Prize in Medicine was awarded on Monday to two US scientists for discovering microRNA, a previously unknown type of genetic switch which is hoped can pave the way for new medical breakthroughs.

title: New York To London In 1 Hour: Hypersonic Jet Set For Test Flight In 2025
content: Developed by startup engineering company Venus Aerospace, this futuristic plane will reach astonishing speeds of up to Mach 6 (3,600mph/5,795km/h).
summary: Developed by startup engineering company Venus Aerospace, this futuristic plane will reach astonishing speeds of up to Mach 6 (3,600mph/5,795km/h).

title: After Helene, Florida Orders Evacuations As Hurricane Milton Strengthens
content: Florida Governor Ron DeSantis has declared 51 of the state's 67 counties under a state of emergency, predicting Hurricane Milton could have "major, major impacts".
summary: Florida Governor Ron DeSantis has declared 51 of the state's 67 counties under a state of emergency, predicting Hurricane Milton could have "major, major impacts".

title: "Its An Earthquake," Says Gary Ruvkun, 2024 Nobel Prize In Medicine Winner
content: US scientist Gary Ruvkun, who on Monday won the Nobel Prize in Medicine with fellow American Victor Ambros for their discovery of microRNA, said winning the honour was like "an earthquake".
summary: US scientist Gary Ruvkun, who on Monday won the Nobel Prize in Medicine with fellow American Victor Ambros for their discovery of microRNA, said winning the honour was like "an earthquake".

title: On 1st Anniversary Of War, Fate Of 63 Hostages Held In Gaza Unknown
content: For Hamas, the hostages are key bargaining chips in negotiations with Israel aiming to secure a truce and the release of Palestinian prisoners.
summary: For Hamas, the hostages are key bargaining chips in negotiations with Israel aiming to secure a truce and the release of Palestinian prisoners.

title: Earthquakes In Iran And Israel Fuel Theories Of Covert Nuclear Testing
content: The unusual timing of the earthquakes, coupled with the ongoing geopolitical tensions between Israel and Iran, led to speculations about a covert nuclear test being conducted.
summary: The unusual timing of the earthquakes, coupled with the ongoing geopolitical tensions between Israel and Iran, led to speculations about a covert nuclear test being conducted.

title: US Teacher Caught Having Sex With Minor Student At Under-Construction Home
content: The teacher was charged with improper relationship between educator and student, a second-degree felony, and is being held at the Comal County Jail.
summary: The teacher was charged with improper relationship between educator and student, a second-degree felony, and is being held at the Comal County Jail.
